thread.title: WAGE SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of WageWorks, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: WAGE SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of WageWorks, Inc.

organizations.name: board of directors of wageworks, inc

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether WageWorks, Inc. (“WageWorks” or the “Company”) (NYSE:WAGE) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/WAGE-Info-Request-Form-1850 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On March 1, 2018, WageWorks announced it would delay filing its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2017. On this news the Company’s share price fell $9.75 per share, or nearly 20%, to close at $42.70 on March 1, 2018.
To learn more about the investigation of WageWorks contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/WAGE-Info-Request-Form-1850 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180316005637/en/
The Law Offices of Vincent Wong
Vincent Wong, Esq., 212.425.1140
